title: Clinical Practice Competency Enhancement: Inquiry-Based Teaching Through Concurrent Enrollment Programs and UDL Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational methodologies and understanding of mathematical modeling
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners improve instructional design by integrating UDL principles into inquiry-based teaching methodologies
Learners develop instructional strategies reflecting educational equity goals within concurrent enrollment program contexts
Learners collaborate with high school teachers to design instructional materials that promote student engagement and academic growth
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
